英文&quot;speak&#39;是什么意思_百度知道 ... speak out 大点声说 speakeasy [美俚]非法秘密酒店 speakies [美口]有声电影; 话剧.

entry.tran: (1920 年到 1933 年美国禁酒时期)非法经营的酒店
entry.def: A speakeasy was a place where people could buy alcoholic drinks illegally in the United States between 1920 and 1933, when alcohol was forbidden.
